title: Bringing NYC gamers together with Narz

replies.body: {{sticker:sg-jinx}} Narz is best.
Thank you so much!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
{{summoner:4}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I'm so glad Riot is featuring creators like Narz!! I didn't know but I live in NY so maybe I'll get to meet them!

OMG I HOPE WE GET TO MEET! I do League of Legends events every month with ROG ASUS! We give away mystery skins and RP. Please also feel free to add me in game or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Narz)! ( I am @Narz on Twitter. Let's be friends!!)
Maybe I should check out her channel
omg thank you! I would love the support. {{sticker:sg-lux}}

I've never met Narz personally and I don't think I will anytime soon but I love what she's done within the League of Legends community in New York. When Worlds came to New York, I was especially excited. And even though I didn't get a chance to go (funds for a high schooler...ugh!!), I still appreciated all of the viewing parties and events she organized. Along with Microsoft starting their League of Legends weekly tournaments, it really gave me a chance to gain some exposure and improve significantly. I've always had a dream that I would be able to compete at the highest levels of play in this game and these people are working to make that a reality for me. Coming from a lowly Silver 2 player, this might not mean much but I hope that I can fulfill my dream one day. Thank you Narz, Microsoft and Riot Games. May we meet someday.
We will absolutely meet! I believe in you and your dreams. Keep fighting! We will one-day cheers to your success! {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Too much botox
That is actually flattering I guess considering it's all natural. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Why post this comment? For someone with love in their name, it’s a pretty crappy thing to say.
1st{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
Why not put moe aka yassuo he is in newyork and racks way more views and is funny and intertainning  to watch not this person
Everything you said is true, but he's not in a protected class. He's a white male.
No bro he's arab

This was about spotlighting Hispanics who play League Of legends, not necessarily people who are big and have lots of views. I hope you understand how important this month is to not only me but all the other Hispanics spotlighted. {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Love this spotlight :) and love that yall focusing so much on just promoting these amazing community members :) and i hear this Narz is just so amazing and fabulouss!!!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
them duckfaces
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

THANK YOU SO MUCH RIOT GAMES FOR SPOTLIGHTING ME!
ERMEGERDDDDD!!!
This is literally like a dream come true.
I want to thank SM, Matt, and Swim Bananas for this honor!
Shoutouts to Kayla and Silcris!
Feel free to follow me on social to know when I am coordinating the next League of Legends event in NYC!
[Twitter ](https://twitter.com/Narz)| [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/narz/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/1narz)

THANK YOU FOR READING! VIVA LOS LATINOS!
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
